title: Which book is better for science and technology for the UPSC civil services? - Quora
tags: Union Public Service Commission of India

response.answer_text: most of the questions from science and technology portion or current oriented.. no need to read books.complete last 2 years of S&T sections of any current affairs magazine(preferably vision)+previous year questions of upsc(both pre and mains)…it is more than enough.. don’t go for books for individual sections like these.(read very less and revise more and make it your forte). all the best..
